CareRequestSupportingCntnt.name: CareRequestSupportingCntnt
CareRequestSupportingCntnt.description: Represents details about supporting content of a care request such as assessments or content documents.

CareRequestId.description: The care request that the supporting content is captured for.

CategoryCodeId.description: The code representing the category that the supporting content belongs to.

InformationTypeCodeId.description: The code respresenting the type of supporting content added to the care request.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

ReasonCodeId.description: The code representing the reason why the supporting content is required.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The assessment or content document used as the supporting content.

RequestedDateTime.description: The date and time when the supporting content was requested.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the content when multiple contents are available.

SubmissionType.description: Specifies the channel that's used to submit the supporting content.

SubmittedDateTime.description: The date and time when the supporting content was submitted.
